CustomField.description: checks Contact Language first, then takes the COO of the Account, else Result is en
CustomField.formula: CASE( Contact.language__c, "de", "Ihre Kundennummer: "+ Account.customer_number__c, "en", "Your customer number: "+ Account.customer_number__c, "es", "Su número de cliente: " + Account.customer_number__c, "fr", "Votre numéro de client : " + Account.customer_number__c, "it", "Il tuo numero cliente: " + Account.customer_number__c, "nl", "Jouw klantnummer: " + Account.customer_number__c, "pl", "Twój numer klienta: " + Account.customer_number__c, "pt", "O teu número de cliente: " + Account.customer_number__c, CASE(Account.Herkunftsland_der_Rechtsform__c, "de", "Ihre Kundennummer: "+ Account.customer_number__c, "gb", "Your customer number: "+ Account.customer_number__c, "es", "Su número de cliente: " + Account.customer_number__c, "fr", "Votre numéro de client : " + Account.customer_number__c, "it", "Il tuo numero cliente: " + Account.customer_number__c, "nl", "Jouw klantnummer: " + Account.customer_number__c, "pl", "Twój numer klienta: " + Account.customer_number__c, "pt", "O teu número de cliente: " + Account.customer_number__c, "Your customer number: "+ Account.customer_number__c))
CustomField.label: Signature Customer Number
